description: Fulham Road Picturehouse takes us back to the glory days of 1930s period glamour in this stunning listed building. Earle Architects (who did a fantastic job with Bromley Picturehouse) have helped us revive Fulham Road to its former vintage

factsheet.heading: History
paragraphs: Fulham Road Picturehouse takes us back to the glory days of 1930s period glamour in this stunning listed building. Earle Architects (who did a fantastic job with Bromley Picturehouse) have helped us revive Fulham Road to its former vintage charm.

factsheet.heading: Cultural
paragraphs: A physical walk through cinema architecture from the 1930's to present day and how the industry has physically changed the way we watch film

location.address: Fulham Road Picturehouse, 142 Fulham Road, SW10 9QR
travel_info: Tube: Fulham Broadway, Gloucester Road, South Kensington

name: Fulham Road Picturehouse
